raw: THE DAR-UL-MADINA INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSITY ISLAMABAD ACT, 2013 CONTENTS CHAPTER I PRELIMINARY 1. Short title and commencement. 2. Definitions. CHAPTER II THE UNIVERSITY 3. Establishment and incorporation of the University. 4. Powers and purposes of the university. 5. University open to all classes, creeds, etc. 6. Teaching at the University. CHAPTER III OFFICERS OF THE UNIVERSITY 7. Officers of the University. 8. Patron. 9. Visitation. 10. Chancellor. 11. Removal from the Board. 12. Vice Chancellor. 13. Appointment and removal of Vice Chancellor. 14. Dean. 15. Registrar. 16. Treasurer. 17. Controller of examinations. CHAPTER IV AUTHORITIES OF THE UNIVERSITY 18. Authorities. 19. Board of trustees. 20. Board. 21. Powers and functions of the Board. 22. Executive Committee. 23. Powers and duties of the Executive Committee. 24. Academic Council. 25. Powers and functions of the Academic Council. 26. Representation committees. 27. Appointment of committees by certain authorities. 28. Shariah advisory committee. CHAPTER V STATUTES, REGULATIONS AND RULES 29. Statutes. 30. Regulations. 31. Amendment and repeal of statutes and regulations. 32. Rules. CHAPTER VI UNIVERSITY FUND 33. University fund. 34. Audit and accounts. CHAPTER VII GENERAL PROVISIONS 35. Commencement of term of members of authorities. 36. Disputes about membership of authorities. 37. Proceedings of authorities not invalidated by vacancies. 38. Removal of difficulties. 39. Indemnity. THE DAR-UL-MADINA INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSITY ISLAMABAD ACT, 2013 ACT NO. V OF 2013 [1st March, 2013] An Act to provide for the establishment of Dar-ul-Madina International University WHEREAS it is expedient to provide for the establishment of Dar-ul-Madina International University and for matters ancillary thereto; It is hereby enacted as follows:- CHAPTER I PRELIMINARY 1. Short title and commencement.-(1) This Act may be called the Dar-ul-Madina International University Islamabad Act, 2013. (2) It shall come into force at once. 2.
law_name: The Dar-Ul-Madina International University Islamabad Act, 2013
